p: The essential oils from other Hedyosmum species leaves ( H. mexicanum, H. bonplandianum, H. arborescens, and H. angustifolium) have also presented high amounts of sabinene in their composition [ 4, 7, 8], as well as Î²-pinene, pinocarvone, and curzerene in the essential oil from H. colombianum leaves [ 6], similarly to our study.
